system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice wh- by Asking a friend about a concert with 'What', 'when', 'where' and 'how'. I want to ensure that I can use 'wh-'words + auxiliary 'do' + subject + main verb to form 'wh-'questions. For example, 'where did you go?, when did you arrive?, What did you do?'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a friend. You (the AI) have just come back from an amazing concert. Start by telling me you are back. Answer my questions. (e.g. “I just got home from the concert. What do you want to know?”, “The show was awesome How was your day?”) Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Asking a friend about a concert with 'What', 'when', 'where' and 'how', using, for example, 'where did you go?, when did you arrive?, What did you do?'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! I just got back from the concert. It was amazing! What do you want to know?
I went to the City Hall. It’s a big place downtown. What else do you want to ask?
You can ask me anything! For example, "What did you do at the concert?" or "When did it start?" Let me know!
What did you do at the concert?
I listened to the music, sang along, and danced with my friends. It was so much fun! Do you have any other questions?
The concert started at 7 PM. Good job! You asked great questions. Talk to you later!
